bestPractices: Prefer well‑known glyphs and keep sizes consistent with surrounding text or controls.
Provide accessible labels when icons are actionable or convey status.
Avoid using colour alone to convey meaning; pair with text or status tokens.
Use tokens/presets for colour and size; avoid ad‑hoc CSS to preserve consistency.
Don’t overload meaning—keep one concept per icon and avoid ambiguous metaphors.
